## Other
* Add Analytics Team Drive?
* Add Culture videos and resources to Expectations or Big Picture page    
  - Simon Sinek How to Create a Culture of Feedback https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C0fRaM7M_WU
  - High Performing Teams all have 3 things in common with their cultures    
    1. A sense of Psychological Safety - speak up when they disagree, take risks; important for learning    
      - conflict is opportunity for collaboration    
      - win or learn    
      - encourage dissent
    2. A sense of Common Understanding - extent to which team members have a common understanding of clarity - I know my roles and your roles and what the deliverables are AND I understand the context and preferences - the empathy piece - I understand you as a human    
      - try to get to know people and try to get others to know each other
    3. A sense of Pro-Social Purpose - extent to which TM feel that they are making a contribution that benefits others    
      - who do we serve?
